title: Phone-based Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate using phone-based login with valid phone numbers and receive a session token.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter a valid phone number
Complete multi-factor authentication if required
Submit login form
Check that user is logged in and session is created

title: Phone-based Authentication Failure with Invalid Number
description: Verify that authentication fails when using invalid phone numbers and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter an invalid phone number format
Submit login form
Validate error message is displayed indicating invalid phone number
Verify no session is created

title: Rate Limiting on Authentication Attempts
description: Verify that the authentication system enforces rate limiting to prevent abuse and provides informative feedback.

steps.description: Attempt multiple consecutive login attempts within a short time frame from the same phone number or IP
Confirm that further attempts are blocked or delayed with rate limit message

title: Financial Record Creation and Categorization
description: Verify users can add financial records with correct categorization and all data fields accepted correctly.

steps.description: Login as a Business or Premium user
Navigate to financial records page
Create a new income record with valid data, selecting appropriate category
Confirm record is saved and visible with correct categorization
Create an expense record with valid data
Verify expense record is added and correctly categorized

title: Financial Record Export Functionality
description: Verify that financial records can be exported correctly in CSV and PDF formats for paid plans.

steps.description: Login as a paid plan user
Go to financial management section
Perform export of records filtered by date range and categories
Verify exported CSV and PDF files include all selected records accurately and have correct formatting
Attempt export as a free plan user
Confirm export option is disabled or access denied

title: Google Workspace Integration for Calendar Events
description: Verify users can create, update, and delete calendar events synchronized with Google Calendar and reflect changes accurately.

steps.description: Login with account linked to Google Workspace
Create an event via app calendar interface
Confirm event is visible both in app and Google Calendar
Modify the eventâ€™s date/time and details
Verify updates sync to Google Calendar correctly
Delete the event from app
Confirm event is removed from Google Calendar

title: WhatsApp Opt-in and Opt-out Message Handling
description: Ensure the system correctly handles WhatsApp opt-in/out status and respects messaging limits to prevent spam flags.

steps.description: Send opt-in request message from user via WhatsApp
Confirm system registers opt-in and enables messaging
Send opt-out request message via WhatsApp
Confirm system disables outbound messaging and respects user choice
Send multiple automated messages within WhatsApp limits
Verify system enforces message rate limits and does not exceed WhatsApp policies

title: Role-Based Access Control and Plan Restrictions
description: Verify that features and sub-agent types are accessible only according to user's role and subscription level with proper enforcement.

steps.description: Login with Free plan user
Verify unavailability of Premium-only features and sub-agents
Login with Business plan user
Confirm access to Business sub-agents and features, deny Premium-only
Attempt to access restricted feature directly via URL or API
Confirm access is denied with appropriate message

title: Backup System Daily Off-site Backup and Restoration
description: Validate that daily backups are created securely for Premium users and test restoration from backup data periodically.

steps.description: Login as Premium user
Trigger or wait for automatic daily backup
Verify backup file creation in off-site location with secure encryption
Perform restoration from backup
Confirm data integrity and restoration completeness

title: Support Ticket Creation and Priority Handling
description: Verify that users can create support tickets, receive FAQs, and that higher-tier users receive prioritized responses.

steps.description: Login as Free plan user
Submit a support ticket with detailed description
Ticket is created and queued with standard priority
Access support FAQ section
Confirm relevant FAQs are displayed
Login as Premium user
Submit a support ticket
Verify ticket is marked with priority flag for expedited handling

title: Dashboard Real-Time Data and Export Reports
description: Ensure dashboard displays real-time insights, charts update correctly, and reports export accurate data with filters applied.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Verify all overview cards and charts show current data
Apply filters and refresh dashboard
Confirm charts and metrics update accordingly
Export reports in available formats on paid plan
Verify that exported files contain correct filtered data

title: AI Sub-agent Functionalities per Subscription Plan
description: Validate that sub-agent features (e.g., SDR, Marketing, Scheduling, Video Generation) function correctly and only activate for permitted plans.

steps.description: Login as Free plan user
Verify sub-agent options are limited
Login as Business user
Access sub-agents like SDR, Marketing, Scheduling successfully
Login as Premium user
Use Video generation and Development sub-agents
Confirm these features work and restrict disables with invalid user role or plan

title: UI Responsiveness and Theme Toggle
description: Confirm the UI adapts seamlessly across screen sizes and theme toggle switches between dark and light modes preserving user preferences.

steps.description: Login and load main application UI
Verify UI elements and layouts render correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Toggle theme switch to dark mode
Confirm UI updates colors and styles accordingly
Reload page and verify theme preference persists

title: LGPD Compliance: Data Privacy and Opt-out Management
description: Ensure system handles user data privacy requests correctly, implements opt-out functionality adhering to LGPD, and deletes or anonymizes data as required.

steps.description: Request data export for personal data
Verify export contains correct user data in proper format
Submit data deletion request
Confirm data is deleted or anonymized in compliance with LGPD
Send opt-out message via WhatsApp
System disables all messaging and respects user privacy accordingly

title: Support System FAQ Accessibility and Search
description: Verify that the FAQ section is accessible from support interface and global search can locate relevant FAQ articles quickly.

steps.description: Navigate to support section
Access FAQ tab and browse categories
Confirm FAQs load correctly and are relevant
Perform global search with keywords related to common support queries
Verify search results include matching FAQ articles

title: Scheduling Agent Sending WhatsApp Reminders
description: Validate scheduling agents create calendar events with associated WhatsApp reminders sent on schedule respecting messaging limits and opt-in status.

steps.description: Schedule an appointment via scheduling sub-agent
Confirm event appears in Google Calendar and app agenda
Ensure user is opted-in to WhatsApp reminders
Verify reminder message is sent via WhatsApp at configured time
Monitor message counts to verify limits are not breached
